scripts.pm2:start: pm2 start src/workers/validateWorker.js --name etl-validate && pm2 start src/workers/transformWorker.js --name etl-transform && pm2 start src/workers/loadWorker.js --name etl-load
scripts.pm2:restart: pm2 restart etl-validate || true && pm2 restart etl-transform || true && pm2 restart etl-load || true
scripts.pm2:stop: pm2 delete etl-validate etl-transform etl-load || true
